start.message: Welcome to our ISP support bot! How can I help you today? Press 1 for Technical Support, 2 for Billing.

technical_support.message: You've reached Technical Support. Are you experiencing issues with: A) Internet, B) TV, C) Phone?

billing_inquiry.message: For Billing Inquiries: 1) View current bill, 2) Payment options, 3) Billing history.

internet_issues.message: Okay, let's troubleshoot your internet. Have you tried restarting your modem and router?

tv_issues.message: For TV issues, please ensure all cables are securely connected. Is the issue with picture, sound, or channels?

phone_issues.message: For phone issues, please check if your phone is properly connected to the wall jack or modem.

view_bill.message: To view your current bill, please log in to your account portal at [link_to_portal].

payment_options.message: We accept payments via [payment_methods_list]. You can pay online or at our offices.

billing_history.message: Your billing history can be viewed in your account portal.

internet_issue_restarted.message: If restarting didn't help, please provide more details or type 'agent' to speak to someone.

internet_issue_restart_guidance.message: Please unplug your modem and router for 30 seconds, then plug them back in. Wait a few minutes for them to reconnect.
